Passage: An Applicant for admission of Securities to the Official List of Securities must pay to the Regulator an application fee of $3,000.
Obligations: Obligation:1 "Payment of Application Fee**: Pay the non-refundable application fee of $3,000 to the Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA) of the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM)."
Obligation:2 "Timely Payment**: Ensure that the application fee is paid by the deadline specified by the FSRA to avoid delays or rejections of your application."

Obligation:3 "Compliance with Application Procedures**: Submit all necessary documentation and information required for the admission of securities, following the application procedures set by the FSRA."
Obligation:4 "Accurate and Complete Information**: Provide accurate and complete information in your application to prevent any discrepancies that could lead to delays or rejection."

Obligation:5 "Adherence to ADGM Regulations and Rules**: Comply with all relevant ADGM regulations and rules concerning the listing of securities, including ongoing compliance with disclosure requirements, market abuse regulations, and any other obligations associated with having securities listed."

Obligation:6 "Consultation with Legal or Compliance Advisors**: Consider consulting with legal or compliance advisors who are familiar with ADGM regulations to ensure full understanding and fulfillment of all obligations."
Obligation:7 "Accurate Payment Process**: Follow the prescribed payment method(s) as outlined by the FSRA, such as bank transfer or cheque."
Obligation:8 "Notification of Changes**: Promptly inform the FSRA of any changes to the information provided in your application or to your circumstances that could affect your application."
Obligation:9 "Adherence to Listing Standards**: Maintain ongoing obligations to adhere to the listing standards and any continuing obligations as a listed entity within the ADGM."

Obligation:10 "Review of ADGM Listing Rules and Guidance**: Regularly review the full ADGM listing rules and any guidance provided by the FSRA to ensure comprehensive understanding and compliance with all obligations."

Passage: A Listed Entity with Securities admitted to the Official List of Securities is not required to pay an annual supervision fee to the Regulator.
Obligations: Obligation:1 "Disclosure and Transparency**: Ensure timely and accurate disclosure of financial and other significant information to the market as per ADGM's Market Rules (MKT)."
Obligation:2 "Corporate Governance**: Comply with ADGM's corporate governance standards, including board composition, responsibilities, and oversight."
Obligation:3 "Market Conduct**: Adhere to rules preventing market abuse, insider trading, and other unfair trading practices to maintain market integrity."

Obligation:4 "Listing Rules Compliance**: Abide by ongoing obligations under ADGM's listing rules, including maintaining free float levels, managing significant transactions, and related party transactions."
Obligation:5 "Reporting Obligations**: Submit periodic financial reports, audited financial statements, and other required documents to the FSRA."
Obligation:6 "Compliance with AML/CFT Requirements**: Implement and maintain adequate anti-money laundering and counter-financing of terrorism controls and procedures."
Obligation:7 "Regulatory Cooperation**: Cooperate with the FSRA and other regulatory bodies during inspections, investigations, or when information is requested."
Obligation:8 "Fit and Proper Requirements**: Ensure that the entity, its senior management, and significant shareholders meet the 'fit and proper' criteria set by the FSRA."
Obligation:9 "Continued Eligibility**: Maintain conditions for initial admission to the Official List, including ongoing requirements related to operations, financial condition, and management."

Obligation:10 "Notification of Changes**: Promptly inform the FSRA of any changes affecting the entity's listed status, such as changes in control or significant corporate events.

Entities should consult the relevant ADGM regulations or seek advice from compliance professionals for detailed obligations."

Passage: Approval of an Offer document originating from outside ADGM
Obligations: Obligation:1 "Compliance with Regulations**: Ensure the offer document complies with the relevant regulations, including the Financial Services and Markets Regulations (FSMR) and rules and guidance issued by the Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA)."
Obligation:2 "FSRA Approval**: Obtain approval from the FSRA by submitting the offer document for review to ensure it meets content and disclosure standards."

Obligation:3 "Disclosure Requirements**: Include necessary information in the offer document for investors to make informed decisions, such as risks, financial statements, and details about the issuer and the securities or products offered."
Obligation:4 "Fair and Clear Communication**: Ensure all communications, including the offer document, are fair, clear, and not misleading, without false or deceptive statements."
Obligation:5 "Marketing Compliance**: Adhere to marketing restrictions and rules on financial promotions, ensuring that marketing activities are in line with regulations."
Obligation:6 "Record-Keeping**: Maintain accurate records of the offer document and related communications as per ADGM's record-keeping requirements."
Obligation:7 "Due Diligence**: Conduct thorough due diligence to verify the accuracy of the offer document and the disclosure of all material information."
Obligation:8 "Notifications and Updates**: Notify the FSRA of significant changes to the offer or information in the offer document and update the document as necessary to reflect material changes."
Obligation:9 "Ongoing Compliance Monitoring**: Continuously monitor compliance with FSMR, FSRA conditions, and any ongoing disclosure obligations."
Obligation:10 "Local Representation**: Consider appointing a local representative or sponsor licensed by the FSRA to assist with submission and ensure ongoing compliance."
Obligation:11 "Translation**: Provide a certified translation of the offer document if it is not in English."
Obligation:12 "Fees**: Pay any applicable fees for the review and approval process conducted by the FSRA."
Obligation:13 "AML and CTF Compliance**: Comply with Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing requirements, including KYC and due diligence procedures."

Obligation:14 "Data Protection**: Follow ADGM's data protection regulations when collecting and processing personal data from potential investors. 

Please note that these action items are based on a general understanding of the obligations and may need to be tailored to the specific circumstances of the offer document and the current regulations at the time of offering. It is advisable to consult the relevant FSRA rules or seek legal advice for precise requirements."

Obligation:4 "Accuracy and Completeness**: Ensure that all information provided in the Offer document and the application is accurate, complete, and not misleading."

Passage: The filing of a Supplementary Prospectus does not trigger the payment of a fee unless the review of the Supplementary Prospectus will require the Regulator to incur substantial additional costs or expend substantial additional effort when conducting its review, in which event the Regulator may require payment of a supplementary fee in accordance with Rule 1.2.4.
Obligations: Obligation:1 "Prepare and File a Supplementary Prospectus**: When significant new factors, material mistakes, or inaccuracies that could affect the assessment of securities are identified, prepare and file a supplementary prospectus with the ADGM's Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA)."

Obligation:2 "Understand Fee Obligations**: Recognize that filing a supplementary prospectus does not automatically incur a fee. However, be prepared to pay a supplementary fee if the review by the FSRA incurs substantial additional costs or effort."
Obligation:3 "Refer to Rule 1.2.4**: Familiarize yourself with Rule 1.2.4 to understand the specifics of any supplementary fee, including how it is calculated and the payment process."

Obligation:4 "Ensure Compliance**: Make sure the supplementary prospectus complies with all relevant ADGM rules and guidelines, ensuring the information is complete, truthful, and accurately updates the previously filed prospectus."
Obligation:5 "Submit in a Timely Manner**: Submit the supplementary prospectus within the specified regulatory timeframe after becoming aware of the new factors, mistakes, or inaccuracies."

Obligation:6 "Maintain Communication with the Regulator**: Keep open lines of communication with the FSRA throughout the process, especially to clarify whether the submission of your supplementary prospectus will require additional fees."
Obligation:7 "Keep Detailed Records**: Maintain thorough records of the submission, any communications with the FSRA, and details regarding any supplementary prospectus and associated fees."
Obligation:8 "Prompt Payment**: If a supplementary fee is required, ensure that the payment is made promptly and in accordance with FSRA procedures."
Obligation:9 "Seek Professional Advice if Necessary**: If there is any doubt or need for further clarification, seek professional advice or contact the FSRA directly."
Obligation:10 "Stay Updated**: Always refer to the most current version of the ADGM regulations and any accompanying guidance or rules that may apply to your specific situation."

Passage: Annual designation fee

A Person granted a designation under Rule 10.1.1 must pay to the Regulator an annual designation fee of $2,000:
(a)	prorated for the remainder of the calendar year following the initial granting of the designation; and
(b)	for subsequent calendar years commencing 1 January, payable in full to the Regulator on or before 31 January of the calendar year to which the fee relates.
Obligations: Obligation:1 "Pay Initial Prorated Annual Designation Fee:** Upon receiving your designation, pay the prorated annual designation fee for the remainder of the calendar year in which the designation is granted."
Obligation:2 "Pay Subsequent Annual Designation Fees:** For each subsequent calendar year after the initial designation, pay the full annual designation fee of $2,000."
Obligation:3 "Meet Payment Deadline:** Ensure that the full annual designation fee for subsequent years is paid on or before January 31st of the relevant calendar year."
Obligation:4 "Maintain Compliance:** Adhere to these financial obligations to maintain your designated status and remain compliant with the regulatory requirements."
Obligation:5 "Understand Penalties for Non-Compliance:** Be aware that failure to meet these financial obligations could result in penalties or the revocation of your designation."
